adrFormatAddress: 505 E 116th St Suite 400, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text: My experience there was wonderful. I was treated with the compassion of people that knew if I was there I was going through a difficult time. The nurses were sweet and polite in everything they asked of me. The doctor took the time to sit with me and drew a diagram of the entire procedure so that I would understand. During the actual procedure everyone in the room was comforting, reassuring and confident. Despite it being the end of day I never for a moment felt rushed. I would 10/10 recommend this practice.

During the actual procedure everyone in the room was comforting, reassuring and confident. Despite it being the end of day I never for a moment felt rushed. I would 10/10 recommend this practice.

originalText.text: Dr. Spinowitz was refreshingly informative and fully explained All my options.He broke everything down in terms that I could understand.  He made me feel as if he really cared. That my health and well-being mattered to him. I am forever grateful.

originalText.text:
Excellent Doctor. Thorough examination, compassionate, excellent communication of diagnosis. I highly recommend him.
His staff shares the same level of excellence and proficiency.

originalText.text: Being in a medical field myself, I am frequently skeptical of office-based surgery places in Queens. I was very pleasantly surprised. The facility was clean, efficient, and well run. The staff was courteous and exuding positive energy. The physician‚Äôs explanation was excellent. Nursing staff were able to help my elderly relative alleviate his anxiety by friendly banter. Overall, highly recommend
